description:
[b]THIS IS AN ENTITY, THE MODEL ALREADY COMES WITH GMOD[/b]
I had to point this out since it's unavoidable that people will start posting that I ripped this model off or some other dumb misconception, I did none of that, this is just a scripted entity.

Someone might remember this from the old Toybox, yes I made that and I remade this one as well.
This one is better suited for multiplayer, since it doesn't actually block the player physics , but it can still be kicked around.
Press use on the ball to pick it up.
The entity can be found under Spawnmenu > Entities > Fun + Games.
This entity also works outside of sandbox, the classname is "sent_soccerball" if you want to spawn it in your gamemode.

And yes, I know it's called a Football in Europe, but I called it Soccerball to avoid confusion with Americans.

Garrysmod.org edition
[url=https://garrysmods.org/download/8/soccer-ball][img]https://garrysmods.org/download/8/button.png[/img][/url]
title: Soccer Ball Entity
